query:
INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, slug, excerpt, content, featuredImage, category, isPublished, publishedAt, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT * FROM (
  SELECT
    'The Complete Guide to Shot Blasting Structural Steel: Preparation for Long-Term Protection' as title,
    'shot-blasting-structural-steel-guide' as slug,
    'Discover why shot blasting is the gold-standard surface preparation method for structural steel, delivering the clean, profiled surface essential for maximum coating adhesion and long-term protection.' as excerpt,
    LOAD_FILE('/home/ubuntu/commercial_shot_blasting_site/blog_post_1.md') as content,
    'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1541888946425-d81bb19240f5?w=1200' as featuredImage,
    'Technical Guides' as category,
    1 as isPublished,
    NOW() as publishedAt,
    NOW() as createdAt,
    NOW() as updatedAt
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'Shot Blasting and Powder Coating: The Perfect Partnership for Durable Metal Finishes',
    'shot-blasting-powder-coating-partnership',
    'Learn how the combination of shot blasting and powder coating creates finishing systems that offer exceptional durability, aesthetic appeal, and long-term value for metal components.',
    LOAD_FILE('/home/ubuntu/commercial_shot_blasting_site/blog_post_2.md'),
    'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565043589221-1a6fd9ae45c7?w=1200',
    'Surface Finishing',
    1,
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    NOW()
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'Restoring Factory and Warehouse Cladding: Why Shot Blasting is Essential for Successful Refurbishment',
    'factory-warehouse-cladding-restoration',
    'Explore why shot blasting has become the definitive solution for preparing cladding panels, delivering thorough contamination removal and surface profiling essential for long-lasting restoration results.',
    LOAD_FILE('/home/ubuntu/commercial_shot_blasting_site/blog_post_3.md'),
    'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581094794329-c8112a89af12?w=1200',
    'Restoration Projects',
    1,
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    NOW()
) AS blog_data;
command:

    'Technical Guides' as category,
    1 as isPublished,
    NOW() as publishedAt,

  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'Shot Blasting and Powder Coating: The Perfect Partnership for Durable Metal Finishes',
    'shot-blasting-powder-coating-partnership',
    'Learn how the combination of shot blasting and powder coating creates finishing systems that offer exceptional durability, aesthetic appeal, and long-term value for metal components.',
    LOAD_FILE('/home/ubuntu/commercial_shot_blasting_site/blog_post_2.md'),
    'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565043589221-1a6fd9ae45c7?w=1200',
    'Surface Finishing',
    1,
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    NOW()
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'Restoring Factory and Warehouse Cladding: Why Shot Blasting is Essential for Successful Refurbishment',
    'factory-warehouse-cladding-restoration',
    'Explore why shot blasting has become the definitive solution for preparing cladding panels, delivering thorough contamination removal and surface profiling essential for long-lasting restoration results.',
    LOAD_FILE('/home/ubuntu/commercial_shot_blasting_site/blog_post_3.md'),
    'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581094794329-c8112a89af12?w=1200',
    'Restoration Projects',
    1,
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    NOW()
) AS blog_data;
logs: ERROR 1048 (23000) at line 1: Column 'content' cannot be null
